mesos/master.description: The URL of the Mesos master.

framework/authentication/enabled.description: Whether framework authentication should be used

framework/authentication/principal.description: The Mesos principal used for authentication.

framework/authentication/secret.description: The path to the Mesos secret file containing the authentication secret.

memsql-mesosphere-framework/zk.description: ZooKeeper URL for storing state. Format: host1:port1
